description:
Get your squish dialed in with this compact shock pump. Pumping up to 300PSI, this shock pump is great for forks and shocks for riders of all sizes.

  • Durable aluminum construction
  • 300PSI gauge is large and easy to read
  • Non-scratch rubber sealing system
  • Micro-adjust release button (1-2PSI) for finding your perfect pressure
name: MEC Shock Pump
